name: Diabetes
description: This model is used to predict that a person has a diabetes or not.

params.name: pregnancies
params.description: a pregnancies is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: glucose
params.description: a glucose is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: blood-pressure
params.description: a blood-pressure is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: insulin
params.description: a insulin is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: bmi
params.description: a bmi   is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: dpf
params.description: a dpf is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

params.name: age
params.description: a age is a value which is used to predict Diabetes

name: Heart
description: This model is used to predict that a person has a Heart issue or not.

params.name: age
params.description: a age is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: male
params.description: a male is a string value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: chest-pain-type
params.description: a chest-pain-type is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: trest-bps
params.description: a trest-bps is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: cholestrol
params.description: a cholestrol   is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: rest-ecg
params.description: a rest-ecg is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: thalach
params.description: a thalach is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: exang
params.description: a exang is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: old-peak
params.description: a old-peak is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: slope
params.description: a slope is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

params.name: thal
params.description: a thal is a value which is used to predict Heart issue

name: Liver
